predictions.text: U.S. Core PCE Price Index (MoM, SA) for October 2025 will print between +0.1% and +0.3% in the BEA release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm in BEA Personal Income and Outlays: 'Core PCE (excluding food and energy), percent change from preceding month, seasonally adjusted' for Oct 2025 falls within 0.1% to 0.3% inclusive.
monitoring_signals: Cleveland Fed nowcast for core PCE
Revisions to CPI services ex-shelter
PCE-weighted healthcare and financial services price components
predictions.rationale: Soft goods disinflation and stable services suggest a moderate core PCE print.

predictions.text: The Conference Board Consumer Confidence Index for November 2025 will print between 96.0 and 105.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify headline Consumer Confidence Index value in The Conference Board’s official November 2025 press release is within 96.0–105.0.
monitoring_signals: University of Michigan sentiment trend
Gasoline prices into late November
Initial jobless claims four-week average
predictions.rationale: Mixed labor signals and value-oriented consumer behavior imply restrained confidence.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10Y–2Y Treasury yield spread (FRED: T10Y2Y) will close at or above -0.10 percentage points on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use FRED daily series T10Y2Y; success if any daily close is >= -0.10 pp by deadline.
monitoring_signals: Term premium measures (ACM model)
Treasury issuance mix (refunding announcements)
Fed communication on balance sheet and policy path
predictions.rationale: Ongoing steepening from supply and policy normalization raises odds of near un-inversion.

predictions.text: From 2025-11-19 close to 2025-12-31 close, SPDR S&P Regional Banking ETF (KRE) adjusted-close total return will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 2.0 percentage points.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute adjusted-close total returns from 2025-11-19 close to 2025-12-31 close for KRE and SPY via a reliable data source (e.g., Yahoo Finance). Success if KRE return minus SPY return ≤ -2.0 pp.
monitoring_signals: Net interest margin guidance and deposit beta updates
Bank credit spreads (CDS, subordinated debt)
Yield curve level and trend
predictions.rationale: Tighter supervision and margin pressure should weigh on regional banks relative to the broad market.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, OFAC will announce at least one Iran-related sanctions designation via an official U.S. Treasury press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check home.treasury.gov press releases for designations explicitly tied to Iran programs (e.g., terrorism, oil trade) dated on or before 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: Regional escalations involving Iran-aligned groups
Maritime interdictions and oil shipping sanctions enforcement
Congressional and administration statements on Iran policy
predictions.rationale: Persistent regional tensions and enforcement posture make new Iran designations likely.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, CISA will issue at least one new Emergency Directive to federal civilian agencies.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm a newly posted Emergency Directive (ED-XX-XX) on CISA’s official Emergency Directives page with publication date on or before 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: High-severity zero-days exploited in the wild
Widespread SaaS/IaaS outages or supply-chain compromises
CISA KEV catalog surges
predictions.rationale: Large-scale outages and active exploitation increase the chance of an emergency directive.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report will show a weekly change in U.S. commercial crude oil inventories (excluding SPR) of -6.0 million barrels or more (draw) in at least one report published by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in EIA WPSR Table 1 that any weekly change in commercial crude stocks is ≤ -6.0 million barrels by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: U.S. refinery utilization rates
Net crude imports/exports and SPR flows
Gulf Coast shipping/weather disruptions
predictions.rationale: Year-end refinery runs and export swings can produce a sizable one-week draw.

predictions.text: In CDC FluView, the national outpatient ILI percentage will reach at or above 3.0% in at least one weekly report released by 2025-12-20.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the ‘Percent of visits for Influenza-Like Illness (ILI)’ at the national level in any FluView report released on or before 2025-12-20 is ≥ 3.0%.
monitoring_signals: Region-specific ILI trends across HHS regions
Respiratory virus hospitalization data (Flu, RSV, COVID)
Wastewater viral concentration indicators
predictions.rationale: Seasonal uptick and early multi-pathogen activity point to higher ILI incidence.

predictions.text: U.S. Nonfarm Payrolls (headline change, SA) for November 2025 will print between +90,000 and +190,000 in the BLS Employment Situation report.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the BLS Employment Situation news release for November 2025; confirm total nonfarm payroll employment change is within +90k to +190k inclusive.
monitoring_signals: Initial and continuing jobless claims
ADP private payrolls
Challenger job cuts report
predictions.rationale: Hiring remains positive but cooling amid softer housing and discretionary demand.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, Apple, Microsoft, Alphabet, Amazon, or Meta will announce a definitive agreement to acquire a company with a disclosed transaction value of at least $500 million.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via official company press release or SEC filing (e.g., 8-K) that a definitive agreement is signed with disclosed value ≥ $500M by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Regulatory signals from FTC/DOJ on Big Tech mergers
Cash balances and buyback vs M&A commentary
Private AI/infra valuation resets prompting sales
predictions.rationale: Improved antitrust outlook and strategic AI/infra needs support a sizable year-end deal.

predictions.text: The AAA U.S. national average price for regular gasoline will print at or below $2.90 per gallon on at least one reporting date by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the AAA Daily Fuel Gauge Report national average regular price is ≤ $2.90/gal on any date through 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: WTI and Brent front-month prices
Regional refinery utilization and unplanned outages
RBOB futures and seasonal demand trends
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand softness and ample supply could drive a late-year price trough.

predictions.text: The Brent–WTI front-month settlement spread will close at or above $5.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Using official settlements (ICE Brent vs. NYMEX WTI), confirm any trading day’s Brent settle minus WTI settle is ≥ $5.00/bbl by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Geopolitical risk premia in MENA
U.S. crude export differentials and shipping constraints
Inventory trends at Cushing and ARA hubs
predictions.rationale: Geopolitical tensions and export logistics can widen Brent’s premium to WTI.
